mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM lesson_review lr INNER JOIN applied_lesson al ON lr.apply_seq = al.apply_seq INNER JOIN lesson l ON al.lesson_seq = l.lesson_seq WHERE l.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT a.apply_seq, l.lesson_name from applied_lesson a, lesson l, users u WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} and l.lesson_seq = a.lesson_seq MINUS SELECT a.apply_seq, l.lesson_name FROM lesson_review r, applied_lesson a, lesson l where a.user_id = #{userId} and a.apply_seq = r.apply_seq

SELECT l.lesson_name, r.review from LESSON l, USERS u, LESSON_REVIEW r, APPLIED_LESSON a WHERE a.user_id = u.user_id AND l.lesson_seq = a.lesson_seq AND r.apply_seq = a.apply_seq AND u.user_id = #{user_id} order by l.lesson_seq desc
